name: Raise Morale

passives.name: Raise Morale
passives.effects: {{ci|Gangplank}} and his allies within {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} gain {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, which persists for 2 seconds after leaving the area.

effects_structured.raw: {{ci|Gangplank}} and his allies within {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} gain {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, which persists for 2 seconds after leaving the area.

simpleDescription: Allies in the Cannon Barrage gain <speed>bonus Move Speed</speed>.
